Name: Ascended Pyromancy Flame
Availability: After you reinforce a Pyromancer Flame to +15, talk to Quelana of Izalith in the Blighttown swamp. She will ascend it to a stronger flame with a different graphic.

Name: Pyromancy Flame
Availability: Starting equipment for Pyromancers. Laurentius of the Great Swamp gift when he arrives at Firelink Shrine Eingyi gift
